author: @fox6now
title: Politics
text: [Wisconsin legislative maps; Republicans race to reach deal](/news/wisconsin-legislative-maps-republicans-deal) Wisconsin Republicans were scrambling to come up with new legislative district maps that might win the approval of Democratic Gov. Tony Evers. [Donald Trump wins New Hampshire primary as rematch with Biden seems likely](/news/donald-trump-projected-to-win-new-hampshire-primary-as-rematch-with-biden-seems-likely) In New Hampshire, Donald Trump secured his second straight victory in his quest for the 2024 GOP nomination. [New legislative maps; WI Republicans make last-ditch effort](/news/new-legislative-maps-republicans-make-last-effort) Wisconsin Republicans made a last-ditch effort Tuesday to avoid having the liberal-controlled state Supreme Court put in place new legislative district boundaries for the November election. [Wisconsin tax cut legislation; Republicans bring back for 3rd time](/news/wisconsin-tax-cut-legislation-republicans) Republican legislators are trying to pass a tax cut plan before they head home to campaign even though Democratic Gov. Tony Evers has vetoed their last two proposals. [Wisconsin VP Kamala Harris visit; discusses abortion bans in Big Bend](/news/wisconsin-vp-kamala-harris-visit-abortion-bans-big-bend) Vice President Kamala Harris delivered remarks in Big Bend on Monday, Jan. 22 as part of her nationwide "Fight for Reproductive Freedoms" tour. [President Biden Superior, Wisconsin visit set for Thursday, Jan. 25](/news/president-biden-superior-wisconsin-visit-jan-25-2024) The White House announced President Joe Biden is traveling to Superior, Wisconsin on Thursday, Jan. 25 to discuss his 'Bidenomics" and “Investing in American Agenda." [Nikki Haley says Trump in mental 'decline,' claims 'he's not at the same level' as 2016](/news/nikki-haley-trump-mental-decline-comments) Former South Carolina Gov. Nikki Haley says former President Donald Trump is in mental "decline" and is no longer as competent as he was in 2016. [New Hampshire primary: Why isn’t Biden on the ballot? And other things to know](/news/new-hampshire-democratic-primary-biden-not-on-ballot-why-nikki-haley-trump) While Nikki Haley’s performance at the New Hampshire primary Tuesday will be watched closely, the drama going on behind-the-scenes between the state and the DNC is worth keeping an eye on too. [Who is running for president in 2024? See the candidates](/news/2024-presidential-candidates-who-is-running-for-president-democrat-republican-trump-biden) From a former president to the current one, here are the main active campaigns in a bid for the White House in the 2024 election. [Wisconsin GOP proposal; abortion ban after 14 weeks of pregnancy](/news/wisconsin-gop-proposal-abortion-ban-14-weeks-pregnancy) Wisconsin Republicans are proposing a bill that would ban abortion after 14 weeks of pregnancy except in the case of a medical emergency. [Congress OKs spending bill to avert government shutdown through early March](/news/congress-oks-spending-bill-to-avert-government-shutdown-through-early-march) Congress has sent President Joe Biden a short-term spending bill that would avert a looming partial government shutdown and fund federal agencies into March. [Wisconsin school strip searches, Assembly OKs changes to law](/news/wisconsin-school-strip-search-law) The Wisconsin Assembly passed changes to a state law regarding school strip searches, making it illegal to conduct searches down to the underwear. [Wolfe impeachment attempt, Wisconsin Republican leader derides effort](/news/wisconsin-elections-wolfe-impeachment-brandtjen) A Republican attempt to impeach Meagan Wolfe, Wisconsin's top elections official, will be ignored, the Assembly's GOP majority leader said Thursday. [Wisconsin congressional maps; Democrats seek new maps for fall election](/news/wisconsin-congressional-maps-democrats-fall-election) A Washington law firm that tries to help Democrats win elections has asked the liberal-controlled Wisconsin Supreme Court to throw out the state's congressional maps. [Wisconsin election maps, Robin Vos slams Democrats' proposal](/news/wisconsin-legislative-maps-proposal-vos) Wisconsin Assembly Speaker Robin Vos slammed proposals from Democrats as "a political gerrymander" and threatened an appeal to the U.S. Supreme Court. [Wisconsin's state utility regulator fired after Senate vote](/news/wisconsin-utility-regulator-fired-republicans) The Wisconsin Senate voted Tuesday to fire a state utility regulator because he supports setting energy rates according to customers’ ability to pay. [Child tax credit expansion part of bipartisan $78B deal proposed in Congress](/money/child-tax-credit-expansion-part-of-bipartisan-78b-deal-proposed-in-congress) In a bipartisan effort, senior Congress lawmakers have unveiled a $78 billion tax deal aimed at expanding child tax credits and providing tax breaks for businesses. [Trump set to face jury over sex abuse and defamation claims](/news/trump-jury-sex-abuse-defamation-claims) Jury selection begins Tuesday morning at a federal court in Manhattan. Opening arguments could take place by afternoon in what is essentially a second penalty phase of a legal fight Carroll has already won. [Asa Hutchinson ends his 2024 campaign after sixth-place finish in Iowa caucuses](/election/asa-hutchinson-ends-2024-campaign-president) Former Arkansas Gov. Asa Hutchinson dropped his long-shot bid for the Republican presidential nomination on Tuesday, ending a candidacy that served as a throwback to an earlier era of the GOP but ultimately failed to resonate. [Analysis: Who voted for Trump in Iowa – and who didn't](/election/iowa-caucus-voter-analysis-2024-trump-haley-desantis) Donald Trump won almost every demographic group by double-digit margins. He was particularly strong among some of the largest groups of Iowa Republican caucusgoers: those without a college degree, very conservative voters and rural voters.

author: Esther Odili
title: “Unacceptable”: Shehu Sani Reacts As Muslim Cleric Calls for the Killing of Tinubu’s Wife - Legit.ng
text: “Unacceptable”: Shehu Sani Reacts As Muslim Cleric Calls for the Killing of Tinubu’s Wife - Shehu Sani has condemned the statement made by a Muslim cleric against the personality of the First Lady, Oluremi Tinubu - Sani maintained that the cleric's call for the killing of Senator Remi Tinubu is unacceptable and should be condemned - Reacting to Sani's statement on his social media page, many Nigerians urged President Bola Tinubu to immediately arrest the cleric Legit.ng journalist Esther Odili has over two years of experience covering [political parties](https://www.legit.ng/1197958-full-list-political-parties-nigeria-leaders.html) and movements. Former Kaduna Senator [Shehu Sani](https://www.legit.ng/tags/shehu-sani/) has reacted after an Islamic cleric declared that Nigeria's First Lady, [Oluremi Tinubu](https://www.legit.ng/nigeria/1577247-hard-times-tinubus-wife-sends-message-hope-nigerians/), deserves to die for being a pastor. [Sani](https://www.legit.ng/tags/shehu-sani/) condemned the statement by the cleric and maintained that criticising the government and its policies is the right of the citizens, but calling for the death of a First Lady is "utterly unacceptable." In a video that has gone viral, shared on X on Wednesday, February 21, a cleric is heard saying the [Muslim/Muslim ticket](https://www.legit.ng/politics/1577377-amid-nigerias-economic-turmoil-sheikh-jingir-reaffirms-support-muslim-muslim-ticket/) that brought President [Tinubu](https://www.legit.ng/tags/bola-tinubu/) to power was a scam. PAY ATTENTION: [Click “See First” under the “Following” tab to see Legit.ng News on your Facebook News Feed! ](https://www.legit.ng/1325957-new-facebook-algorithm-how-legitngs-posts-timeline-now.html) [SaharaReporters ](https://saharareporters.com/2024/02/22/president-tinubus-wife-remi-deserves-be-killed-muslims-being-leader-infidels-says)confirmed that the cleric, whose identity could not be ascertained by Legit.ng as at the time of filing this report, therefore, averred that the wife of the president, "being an infidel should be put to death as provided for in the Quran". He, however, did not provide any chapter or verse of the Quran to support his claim. "Now, Tinubu @officialABAT, his wife is an #infidel. Even as an infidel, she is an 'oga' (a leader) among the infidels. Even her, God's judgement says she must be killed.. She's a pastor... Leaders of infidels (Christianity), Allah says they must be killed," The Muslim cleric said. Shehu Sani condemns the words of the Islamic cleric Reacting, Shehu Sani in [a post](https://twitter.com/ShehuSani/status/1760648759048867906) shared on his X account on Thursday, February 22, faulted the cleric's assertion. Sani tweeted: "Criticising the Government and its policies is within the ambit of democratic rights;but Calling for the killing of Senator Remi Tinubu by the religious cleric is unacceptable and utterly condemnable." Watch the video below See the video below as the Islamic cleric says Tinubu's wife deserves to be killed. Muslim-Muslim ticket: Sharia Council slams Tinubu’s govt In another report, [Legit.ng reported](https://www.legit.ng/politics/1574206-sharia-council-slams-tinubus-govt-admits-regret-backing-muslim-muslim-ticket/) that President Bola Ahmed Tinubu has been critiqued by the Supreme Council for Sharia in [Nigeria](https://www.legit.ng/nigeria/) (SCSN). The organisation has accused President [Tinubu](https://www.legit.ng/tags/bola-tinubu/) of marginalising them since he assumed office in May 2023. President Tinubu has, however, responded to their complaint by summoning an emergency meeting with their leaders. PAY ATTENTION: [Stay Informed and follow us on Google News!](https://news.google.com/publications/CAAiEE_46eMZDNHXP_a26TYOsGIqFAgKIhBP-OnjGQzR1z_2tuk2DrBi) Source: Legit.ng

author: Candice Franklin
title: What The 10 Most Stupid ADHD Medication Uk Failures Of All Time Could Have Been Prevented
text:
ADHD Medication – Treatment For ADHD
Treatment can you get adhd medication without a diagnosis help people who have ADHD to concentrate better, feel more relaxed and be less impulsive. It is typically a combination of medicine and therapy.
Stimulants boost brain activity in areas that regulate attention and behavior. Methylphenidate (known as Ritalin) is one of the most frequently prescribed medications to treat adults suffering from adhd medication weight loss uk .
Stimulants
Stimulants are medications that increase activity in the parts of the brain that control attention and behaviour. They are often used in conjunction with cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT). Stimulants increase the levels of dopamine and norepinephrine in your brain. This improves your focus and reduces the effects of certain impulses, such as those that trigger impulsive behavior. Stimulants are generally well tolerated by children and adults but some people may have negative effects, including jitteriness, headaches or an increased heart rate.
There are a number of different stimulant medications available, including methylphenidate (Ritalin) and dextroamphetamine (Dexamphetamine) as well as atomoxetine (Strattera) and modafinil (Provigil). The results of the biggest network meta-analysis to date, published in the British Medical Journal in 2016 support amphetamines for adults with adhd medication how does it work . Lisdexamfetamine is currently licensed in the UK and has a distinct advantage over short-acting stimulants because it doesn’t disappear throughout the day. It also only requires one dose a day. Patients used to the option of taking short-acting amphetamines three or four times a day. It was a challenge for patients to remember to take and could lead to low adherence.
It is important to get an accurate medical history in order to determine if a person with ADHD might have other health issues that are contributing to their symptoms. A medical issue such as thyroid disorders, sleep apnea or other conditions could be causing your child’s fatigue or difficulty concentrating. You should also mention any problems with addiction to your doctor. The use of prescription, over-the counter or illegal drugs could affect your child’s concentration.
Many medical professionals recommend that children are medicated for ADHD to enhance their school performance and allow for them to develop into happy, healthy adults. However the decision to treat a child with ADHD is not considered lightly by parents and can be a long and complicated process. Many children will experience side effects, like insomnia, irritability and anxiety, but the majority of the time, these issues can be overcome by careful monitoring and gradual increases in dosage.
Some parents choose to pursue private treatment for their child, which involves a series of appointments with a specialist psychiatrist to start the medication and track the progress. It could take up to five sessions followed by monthly or fortnightly appointments as the child becomes familiar with the medication. Many families are surprised to learn that NHS waiting lists are extremely long, and private health care is a more efficient method to care. Your GP will be provided with a thorough report on your child’s progress. He or she will monitor the medication that was prescribed by your psychiatrist. In some cases, you may return to the NHS for this how to get medication for adhd medication for women uk, click the following document , continue to ensure that your GP is aware of any medications that have been prescribed to your child. They will conduct regular checks and reviews.

author: Press Release Distribution Service
title: Orange County Inmate Search Revolutionizes Bail Bonds with Complimentary Inmate Locator Services and Unmatched Rates | dailytimesleader.com | Serving West Point & Clay County Since 1867
text:
United States - December 29, 2023 —
Orange County Inmate Search , a distinguished bail bonds company based in Costa Mesa, Orange County, is reshaping the bail bonds landscape by offering free inmate locator services coupled with the lowest rates in the industry.
For over a decade, this compassionate and client-focused company has stood out in the bail bonds sector. Their 24-hour services and flexible bail bond options ranging from 1% to 3% have provided unparalleled support to those in need. The company's track record speaks volumes, having successfully bailed over 1,000 individuals out of jails in San Diego, San Bernardino, Riverside, Los Angeles County, and Orange County.
The introduction of free inmate locator services is a game-changer, especially for those navigating the complexities of the judicial system. This free service eases the stress and confusion often associated with locating incarcerated loved ones, streamlining the bail process.
What sets Orange County Inmate Search apart is not just their rates, but their commitment to ethical and transparent practices. There are no hidden fees or annual charges, ensuring clients face no unexpected financial burdens. The interest-free financing options on bail bonds, subject to approved credit, further alleviate the financial strain on clients. The location also offers Santa Ana Inmate Search services as well as Indio Inmate Search services.
The company's team of over 10 expert bail agents, all fluent in English and Spanish, works tirelessly to secure the release of clients in less than 24 hours. Their kindness and professionalism are echoed in the glowing reviews they have received on Google.
In a recent statement, a company spokesperson said, "Our mission is to provide kind and efficient service to those in difficult situations. We believe in offering the lowest legal rates, transparent practices, and a quick response to ensure our clients' swift release."
With their groundbreaking free inmate locator service and commitment to affordable, ethical bail bond options, Orange County Inmate Search is not just a company - it's a beacon of hope for those seeking justice and fairness in the bail system.
